channel.title: Getting Started on Amazon Connect SI Onboarding Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Amazon Connect SI Onboarding Workshop

item.title: A Primer on Amazon Connect
item.description: Access for this course requires logging into the APN Partner Central. The completion of this course will be associated with your APN credentials. Course Objectives Configure a cloud-based contact center using Amazon Connect. Identify architectural components of the caller version Launch an Amazon Connect instance. Design an interactive voice response (IVR) system using the graphical editor within Amazon Connect. Integrate Amazon Connect with different AWS services including AWS IAM, AWS Lambda, Amazon DynamoDB, and Amazon Lex.

item.title: Additional Resources for Integrated Services
item.description: AWS Lambda Foundations Amazon DynamoDB Service Primer
